questions.question: Why is Class written as className in React?

options.answer: Because it fits with React's naming scheme.
It is a reserved keyword in JavaScript
It is unidirectional, from the parent to the children.
It is unidirectional from the children to the parent.

questions.question: How would you delay an API call until a component has mounted?

options.answer: Place the API call in the useEffect hook with an empty dependency array as it's argument.
Place the API call in the useState hook at the top level of the document.
